av4e053at Void
Rarity: Super Rare
Inventory options for this figure are controlled by the main/parent unit.
Void
When Sentry would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with an Avengers Forever #053b Sentry on click #7. That character gains Immune until your next turn even if lost. Protected: Pulse Wave.
5 Points
